name: Build-A-Snowman Simulator
description:
Build-A-Snowman was made for Cozy Winter Jam 2022
Theme: Connections

SETTING

Connect snowballs to build as many Snowmen as possible before nightfall!

GAMEPLAY

A | D | Space - Move Left | Right | Jump
Q - Create Snowball
E - Pick Up/ Drop/Place Snowball | Pick Up/Place Item
Tab - Switch through Snowballs in snowman
Number 1-5 - Pick Item Slot
G - Drop selected Item
X - Destroy selected Object
K - Help

Escape - Back to Main Menu
